1.post_text:
Want to win a pair of tickets to Universal Studios Singapore’s Halloween Horror Nights™ 5 at Resorts World Sentosa?
 
1. Snap a picture of yourself with a purchased Ribena® Chill, Mango Peach Chill, Iced Milk Coffee, Iced Black Coffee, Mocha Frappé, Caramel Frappé, Mudpie McFlurry® or Strawberry Shortcake McFlurry®.
2. Caption the photo with why you want to win the tickets and hashtag #HHN5.
3. Post it as a comment below. 
 
If your photo is among the top 50 most-liked, you and a friend will be on your way to the ultimate chill thrill. 
 
Terms and conditions apply: https://goo.gl/sUp9KP 
 
Visuals are for illustration purposes only.

comments.message:
Hi McDonalds, I've heard that your delivery men didn't get any delivery income during that time due to your decision to cancel. 

I don't think it's fair that McDonalds should look good while depriving your delivery staff of a chance to earn extra income. Their families may be depending on that little extra to help them eat or pay the bills.

Could you give your staff a haze subsidy income during this time, give out free N95 masks, and also encourage your customers to tip your delivery staff too?
but someone shared the photo out stated that u delivery resume before 1030am..
Refund me back. Disgusting. I waited for delivery to resume since morning and this is what i get?
Is McDonald's using any product from Asia Pulp and Paper? Asia Pulp and Paper has admitted that their suppliers are burning Indonesia.

Bought $20++ and didn't get my Hot cake syrup for my hot cake! 
Now you telling me how committed you are! 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
Or you expected your customer to drive there again just for your Syrup?
Kindly put a more responsible staff in your front line!
Good move. What about the food? is it healthy to eat Mc Do tho? May be 1 year of that food is equivalent to 2 or 3 days of haze.  Anyway better to move my fat ass from my chair to get my Big Mc!
Suggest they still deliver as usual, using quality masks. They can ride slower & customers will understand.  :)
The psi is still quite high so pls let ur riders take the necessary precautions while on the raod
Health n safety first
Well done.

4.post_text:
We have resumed McDelivery services starting from 1030am this morning, and are committed to serving you to the best of our ability.

Our main concerns are for the welfare of our staff and the satisfaction of our customers. While the haze persists, we ask for your kind understanding that services may be disrupted or delayed, depending on environmental conditions in different parts of Singapore.

We have taken precautions to protect our delivery staff, and our aim is to continue serving you safely and responsibly.  

Thank you all for your support.

5.post_text: Due to the current state of the haze, and to ensure the safety of our McDelivery riders, we will be halting all McDelivery orders until further notice. We regret any inconvenience caused and thank you for your kind understanding.

comments.message: Please... Bring back seaweed fries and take away these whatever Ebi and Potato Fries
Like the sweet potato fries but not the burger. It soft and soggy like when i had it last week.

My wife bought 2 set meals on 16th Sep 2015 Tuesday night around 10pm at Causeway Point. But very dissapointted as the sweet potato was run out, and they replaced it with normal fries! How can they run out of sweet potato as it is a 24 hr outlet! Next time, please do a proper promotion and please stock up the items!
Severely over rated. Was looking forward to some good ebi, but taste of seaweed ebi was not good, reminds one of very poor quality fried food. No more ebi Mac's for me

I always look forward to the ebi annual launch. However this time round, i am extremely disappointed. Whoever is behind the creation of this taste, u have done "well" i have asked for a change of the sauce base as both do not suit at all.
However your servers all reluctant. Fine... i stopped eating mac due to that. Always had good impression of mac until recently...
The seaweed taste aweful. While the cereal is too spicy to my liking (sorry my spicy treshold is not high) overpowering the taste. Remember when the first time it was launch it taste much better. Previou round's wasnt too bad too. This one, sorry i'm not gonna eat it anymore. 

Bring back kiasu burger!!!  I miss those...
Tried the Ebi Burger for the 1st time and I must say I'm disappointed.  The shrimp used are heavily phosphated which give the crisp texture but the after taste is almost metallic.
bring back the normal ebi with wasabi pls :)
This burger are the best among other burger of mcdonald.
The cereal one is so much better as compare to the seaweed one! Disappointed with the seaweed version!
I dont like it. The taste is horible.
I dunno what chemicals they used in the patties but it made my lips and tongue itchy and swollen. I don't have any shrimp or nut allergy but im certainly allergic to the chemicals used.
the fries is nice but pls not the burger..
The cereal ebi was better than the seaweed one in my opinion. Keep the sweet potato fries in the menu, its delish! Way better than the normal fries!
Ebi spicy,seaweed ebi also spicy.Can you spare a thought for customers not into spicy stuff?
Please bring back the Spicy Challenge and Spicy Nuggets.

Tried the seaweed one a few weeks back... Have to say... very disappointed... Why?
Was expecting the patty to be around the size of the bun... To think that it was smaller then the bun...
Overall taste? Only taste some of the seaweed... shrimp? Not really... thou they are in there but cant really taste much... sauce? All i tasted were spicy that's all...

i ordered the Ebi cereal via McDelivery - super disappointing. The cereal coating looked sporadic and I can't make out what else goes into the patty. The Prawns are actually small shrimp and even tho' I had asked for extra sauce - the amount given was just sufficient for the 1st patty (I ordered the double). On the sweet potato fries, they are cut too fat, tasted soggy. I have tried better sweet potato fries at places that sell Western food in coffee shops. So I think I will go elsewhere for better food

To be honest, the experience I had is bad.
The purchase I made last week will be my first and last
My patty is dark brown in color, like it had been fried in old/ dirty oil. The patty had a lot of weird starchy, gooey filling. And the prawns/ shrimp tasted rubbery.
I didn't know it was sweet potato fries. and I think McDonald's should stop selling them. The coating tasted weird
The actual look and taste is much poorer than the perceived yummy/ fake illusion I had from the advertisement :0

I try but the taste and the smell make me wan to vomit.
Pls bring back chicken and porridge.
The very first version of ebi burger introduced last year taste better... Non spicy n the kids loved them
Actually the sweer potato fries are weird...
Yup tried the seaweed ebi double.. Ok2 la not tat wonderful
Waiting for shaker fries to come back the double ebi so good👍👅
I like the cereal ebi :x Anyone remember the macs fan burger (rice burger) long long time ago?
Waiting for spicy shaker fries. Seaweed is always.

comments.message: Y'all really swung and missed on the Peace Day Burger thing in ATL.  Whomever decided to pass on that got some bad advice.

7.post_text:
Today is the International Day of Peace – a day set aside by the United Nations to focus the world on peace and generate awareness for the need to eradicate war and violence. 

McDonald’s, along with global brands including DreamWorks Animation, Google, Facebook, Twitter, Cargill, McCain Foods, and Burger King have joined to support the U.N.’s World Food Programme and raise awareness and some much needed funding to fight hunger. 

Right now, 60 million refugees have been forced from their homes as a result of war and conflict – a number larger than at any time since World War II. Half of the refugees are children, and all of them struggle daily with hunger. The ad we’ve created highlights the important role food plays in creating a safer, more peaceful world for everyone. In doing so, we would also like to invite you to learn more about the World Food Programme, and make a donation. 

Visit http://cdn.wfp.org/2015/peace/ today to find out more about how you can give families food and hope for more peaceful days ahead. 

http://McD.to/peaceday

comments.message: I recommend the book "Cholestrol in Daily Food" Its a good read!

I hate the so called 'book' concept in Sg. For everything u need a book? Pregnancy or Parenting or dieting or raising ur kids. I always wonder if all happens according to the books. Just spend time.. Play with them, listen to their stories, enjoy the meal.. Go to the library instead of eating such unhealthy meals. And stop providing this $300 worth of 'parenting books' n pamphlets for the first time mums with all registration. Instead provide something useful for baby. Nobody will refer to the book once the baby is here.

Please restock and extend or have another longer round of these book campaigns. Really lovely. Instead of the useless toys which become trash in the end.. kids enjoy the books. So do the parents. I learnt much more knowledge of each topic from these books together with my boy. Too bad only got two books out of so many so far.
I ordered happy meal via delivery but theres no such option. Is it also for delivery?
Everytime we try to buy the book with the meal they keep telling us there's no more stock for the books and offer us a toy instead. Disappointing. ...
McDonald's : pls continue to have more books instead of toys! This series of books are good!
Books are better than the useless toys they always offer.

I'd like to order 30 sets of Happy to be delivered on 8oct for children's day celebration. Wondering if the promotion for the free book with Happy meal can be extended till then. I believe many teachers would like to gift books to their students as well.
Panda book ? I love pandas 😱🐼
Each time i bought the happy meal sure will got a book but my son like toys he will got a book but not interested..
Love the book concept! Please do this more.
I read his chinese textbook to him! hahahahaha...
More book campaigns!

I bought a happy meal for my boy with a toy at siglap McDonald. But wasn't told that there's a free book that comes along with it. I was told to choose between the toy and the book. I wanted both the toy and book and dont mind topping up a small fee to get the book.

I still remember when my mum brought us to mamah shop to buy "tikam" or when u buy toro u get those u all called useless toys. We were kids and we love those useless toys even when it breaks after few days. So pls stop taking away ur children's childhood... Not enough they face books after books at school, for homework, tuition, enrichment activities, reading time... Now they have to read one from Mcdonalds? My son kept the transformer figurine for 5yrs already and he still plays with it... The so called useless toy.

I went to the McDonald's in Sengkang CC last Friday.  They gave me a toy instead of the book. Asked the staff for the book, they were unsure. And the Manager overheard us and came to say they run out of stocks.  So disappointed.
nice! but don't do away with the toys! most of the toys i had growing up were from McDonald's...toys help kids to exercise their creativity
I love the books..I think they are not just for kids but adults too.. Very educational. Better than toys.
Yes . We ask for book they say no more.really funny.
We love the DK mini books! It was pleasant surprise.
May I know which outlets in the West and Central area still have the last set? Missing the last 2 books.
I am way pass 25 but gosh I love the books. I had my happy meal just now and I adore them.
No point when books are mostly not available or as they put it - sold out
Should free gift more books than toys
Love the books... pls keep it up! Print more books...

8.post_text: Your kids feel especially close to you when you read to them. And this leads to them forming positive attitudes towards reading. So pick up a children’s book from McDonald’s – free with every Happy Meal till September 30. And start feeding your little ones’ appetite for books today! Learn more at goo.gl/ufH63Y

Ebi-kase! A new Ebi burger is coming your way soon. You heard it first, and you get to preview it! Visit any of these 8 branches during the specified time slots to order the secret Ebi burger. You’ll need to say the password “NORI EBI”!

TIME: 3 - 6pm

comments.message: Tried this today and there's no doubt that it is indeed one of McDonald's better burgers - Fresh and Innovative ! However, I am taken aback by the pricing - $7.10 for a single patty meal with standard french fries and a drink and $7.45 if with sweet potato fries. For double patties, it's $9.10 with standard fries and $9.45 with sweet potato fries. That 's in my opinion is no longer classified as fast food pricing. You can definitely get a better alternative meal at these prices or lower at food courts/hawker centres and even at some restaurants. McDonald's should seriously relook at their pricing for these so called 'Special' burgers. By the way, I wanted to order the double patty version but was turned off by the pricing and settled for the single patty one instead.
Pls make the sweet potato fries permanent in your menu!
As an example, I could get Aglio Olio pasta with Prawns for $8.00 from a pasta joint near my block. Compare that to this Ebi Burger ?
Is it just me or was the sauce spicy? The sauce tasted similar to McSpicy to me.
I really don't get some of u ppl... This is prob the best burger from mcdonald ever n the sweet potato fries is really nice, i hope it stay parmanent.

Tried this at Yishun Safra yesterday. The single ebi patty was a thin overfried spread of tiny minced prawn. Shrimp paste sauce was too spicy and tasted like mcspicy. Sweet potato fries tasted doughy and weird. Overall, doesn't match up to the hype.

To each their own but i really loved this! A significant upgrade from the usual ebi burger especially with that sauce and that crunch from the patty and that bun! Really loved it a lot especially paired with the sweet potato fries! Really think Macs took a step in the right direction! Price wise it is steeper than the usual offerings but for the quality and satisfaction that I received, it's 8 dollars well spent! 👍👍👍

I actually kinda like this! But you may need the double to taste the shrimps. The sweet potato fries are a good alt for fries lover to choose a healthier option. The sweet potato fries are light and not salted. It's basically not a very sinful meal from McDonald's as compared to their norms. I would suggest sweet potato fries to remain on the menu ^^
Well to me the patty not that nice to compare with the original ebi burger. The sweet potato definitely need to be a permanent menu.. And yes the price is a bit expensive.
Great addition but why this and not the samurai burger? It's usually out at this time of the year.

This is a pretty good burger! 
But price has to change.
Jus got it at Eastpt. Burger n fries are cold n even the nuggets as well. Doesn't taste good at all for both
Alex wha shiok cereal prawn

Eating Ebi burger now. Disappointing. The bun is hard like cardboard. Soggy patty with little or no prawn. Vegetables that look like they've been picked up from the floor. Overpriced. Looks like a homeless version of the picture. Should hv stuck to the double cheeseburger. Cheaper n tastes like a burger should.
We just had the new Cereal Ebi burger, with Sweet potato fries. It's yummilicious!!!! My daughter and I  ❤️❤️❤️it.👍👍👍
Lots of prawns.. omg... Yummy. Can you come up with a spicy version? Thumbs up for the sweet potato fries

The ebi burger taste good ! But too pricey . Sweet potato nice if I could get a hot one , mine is cold sweet potato .

14.post_text: Crunchy cereal combined with juicy whole shrimps. A drizzle of shrimp paste flavoured sauce. And a white sesame and chive soft bun. Introducing Ebi-kase: A surprising taste experience. Featuring the new Cereal Ebi burger, with Sweet Potato Fries and Honeydew McFlurry to complete the oh-so-oishii experience! #Ebikase

A friendly reminder to our 50 winners of McDonald’s Fond Moments Facebook Contest to please email us at fond.moments@sg.mcd.com by 23:59 hours, 26th August 2015 with the following details:
 
1. Your winning entry and Full name (per NRIC)
2. NRIC No.
3. Address (For mailing the prize to you)
4. Contact Number
*Please note that the above details are required to issue you the Prize Winner's letter and will not be used for any other purposes.
 
The Prize Winner's letter and CYT voucher will be sent via registered mail to you at the address you provide us. 
 
Please ensure the address you provide is accurate as successful delivery to the said provided address by Singpost shall be deemed to be your receipt of the Prize Winner’s letter and voucher.
 
By providing your details, you agree that McDonald’s shall not be responsible or liable once delivery to the said provided address has been effected.

The store manager of McDonald's Clementi Mall prepared our 1-for-1 iced milk coffee. The colours, texture and taste of the two cups of coffee were vastly different - but neither of them tasted good. We threw one away after a few sips as it tasted like sugared milky water; and the other we gave up halfway as it was lacklustre. We hope the quality of the coffee can be improved, if not the 1-for-1 promotion will just be giving bad experiences to two persons.
